short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture tweet inspirations without leaving Twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tweton helps you capture ideas while browsing Twitter without leaving the site or switching to a different app.

Tweton was created with content creators in mind.

Have you got an inspiration for a new Tweet while reading someone's reply or writing a reply while reading your feed?

Now you can instantly capture these tweet inspirations with the help of Tweton.

If you're a content creator looking for an effective and straightforward way to produce new tweets, Tweton is for you!

The extension attaches to Twitter.com as a collapsible sidebar on the left side.
It has a simple yet effective UI without any fluff.

Key Features
✅ Save tweet inspirations
✅ Delete tweet inspirations
✅ Edit tweet inspirations
✅ Expand/Collapse the sidebar
✅ Draft/Published tweet inspirations

More on https://tweton.com
